title: Short-Intensive sMOOC Course for Personalized Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (middle school level)
context.additional_context: Providing personalized math learning experiences via smartphones for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Emphasizing real-world application competencies through real-time interaction and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic statistical analysis techniques to solve work-related mathematical problems.
Learners design personalized learning pathways to achieve an 80%+ target completion rate within one week.
Learners collaborate with peers to produce a single video (under 3 minutes) explaining complex mathematical concepts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
